definitions.definition: To straighten (something that is supposed to be straight).
examples: He trued the spokes of the bicycle wheel.

definitions.definition: To make even, level, symmetrical, or accurate, align ; adjust (often followed by up ).
examples: We spent all night truing up the report.

main_definition: To straighten (something that is supposed to be straight).
secondary_definitions: To make even, level, symmetrical, or accurate, align ; adjust (often followed by up ).
